name: St. Mary's Teaching Hospital
atmosphere: Overcrowded and underfunded. The air is thick with the smell of suffering, carbolic acid, and cheap soup. Nurses rush by with grim expressions.
details: A long, echoing corridor with peeling paint and flickering gas lights.
The chaotic emergency ward, filled with the groans of the sick and injured.
The morgue in the basement, unnaturally cold and quiet.
clues: Patient records of unusual injuries, a doctor who has seen too much, access to the city morgue.
